LanguageData.DestructionAttunedSpiritCore.degreeDatas: {PAWN_nameDef} has a Spirit Core that is attuned towards destructive properties. {PAWN_pronoun} is naturally extremley gifted and skillfull in the arts of combat and destruction.
{PAWN_nameDef} has a Spirit Core that is attuned towards creative properties. {PAWN_pronoun} is naturally extremley gifted in the arts of creation and research.
LanguageData.AngelicSpiritCore.degreeDatas.0.label: Angelic Spirit Core
LanguageData.AngelicSpiritCore.degreeDatas.0.descript: {PAWN_nameDef} has a Spirit Core that has Angelic properties. {PAWN_pronoun} is blessed by the angelic wispers resonating from within thier spirit granting {PAWN_objective} innate life nurturing skills, and high social impact.
LanguageData.DemonicSpiritCore.degreeDatas.0.label: Demonic Spirit Core
LanguageData.DemonicSpiritCore.degreeDatas.0.descript: {PAWN_nameDef} has a Spirit Core that is attuned towards demonic properties. {PAWN_pronoun} will often cave into the demands of the demonic voices from within their spirit and attempt to kill those around them, but in turn is granted god-like combat abilities, even greater than that of a destructive spirit core.
